title: [W]Claimant pay details
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

howOftenClaimantPaid.label: [W]How often was the claimant paid?
howOftenClaimantPaid.hintLabel: [W]Use the same time period (weekly, monthly or annual) that the claimant used on the ET1 form.

claimantNormalTakeHomePay.label: [W]Enter the claimant’s normal take-home pay (optional)
claimantNormalTakeHomePay.hintLabel:
[W]Take-home pay is the pay after tax and insurance deductions.

Include overtime, commission and bonuses.

furtherInfoAboutClaimantPayDetails.label: [W]Do you want to provide any further information about the claimant's pay details? (optional)

howOftenClaimantPaid.required: [W]Tell us how often the claimant was paid
